data.text: Guye loo ɠundiɠii nɔnɔi ʋe. Nii é loozu é zoloo guye wooi ma, nii daa ga: «Bulɛgi ma ʋuaiti». Kolé mavofodaiti ta-ɠidafaawui, ta ta-nɛɛbɛ wuyei.
Zìi ɠa ɲiikpisu ga woo ʋagɔiti,
Nuɓusɛiti kpein saama, è ʋagɛ ti pɛ ba,
Ɗa-woɠa zɔkpɔi ɠili zaama, kɔɔɠɔ nu wolai,
Ɗa-mɛɛinti gaazoɓaʋɛ, nuɓusɛiti ta loo bu è ɠakalaʋɛ,
Ee, GALA, ɗa-masa kpɔkpɔgi ɠa ná yeenɔpɛ, eyɛsu ɠɔ,45:7 Ee, GALA, ɗa-masa kpɔkpɔgi ɠa ná yeenɔpɛ, eyɛsu ɠɔ: Tati pelei taɠili ɓalaa ka ga nii: Ɗa-masadai GALA ge fea è ya, toɠa ná ɠɔoɠɔ ta ɠɔoɠɔ
Telebodai nɛɛʋɛ è ʋɛ, è faa ɲɔi wɔinzeɠe.
Miilegi, ta kanɛlegi, naa ʋɛɛ alɔwɛgi ʋa ta ɗa-zeɠei makugi nɛɛzu.
Wɛlɛ, masa anzanuiti ka ti ga è-ziɛpoluɲɔɠɔiti,
Woilo dòun anzanu, wɛlɛ, è woilo,
Tiil yooi zu nuiti, nuɓusɛiti ti wola ɓɛtɛai,
Anzanu loin maazogai masagi ʋɛ, toɠa volozu masa pɛlɛi wu,
Ta liizu la masagi ʋɔ, é seɠe zuʋuai zu.
È-loun zunuiti ta zei, ti ɠɛ ga masagi, è ɠɛɛni potogi zu.
Nà è-laaseigi ɠula kɛlɛma, gè bo yeeɠɛɠalai pɛ su nuiti ma,
